1. noch nicht das 21. Lebensjahr vollend: 1. hasn't reached 21 years of age, is not gainfully employed and is registered as a job-seeker at an Employment Agency in Germany, or
2. noch nicht das 25. Lebensjahr vollend: 2. hasn't reached the age of 25 and
Angaben zum Zahlungsweg: Information regarding the method of payment
Anschrift, wenn abweichend vom Antragste: Address, if differing from the applicant's address (street/place, street number, postcode, city)
Address (street/place, street number, postcode, city) if deviating from applicant's address
Ausführliche Informationen zum Kindergel: You can find detailed information about child benefit on the internet at
Beachten Sie bitte die anhängenden Hinwe: Please pay attention to the attached information and the information sheet „Kindergeld“.
Bitte beachten Sie, dass Ihr Antrag nur: Please note that your application can only be processed, if it is filled accurately.
Bitte füllen Sie die „Anlage Kind“ volls: Please fill in the "Appendix Child" completely. For an initial application of child benefit after birth, you will have to enclose the "original confirmation of birh for child benefit." For a child born abroad the birth certificate is sufficient as proof. For children over the age of 18 the appendix has only to be filled in, if they fulfil one of the special requirements stated in the child benefit leaflet.
Bitte weisen Sie die wöchentliche Arbeit: Please substantiate the weekly worktime with appropriate documents (e.g. employment contract/certificate of employment from your employer). Deviations from the contractual agreed upon working hours can be substantiated by submission of payslips, a statement of the work account, or an employer statement. Absences due to vacation, sickness or the like don't reduce the contractual agreed upon work time.
Der Bescheid soll nicht mir, sondern fol: The notification is not to be sent to me, instead it is to be sent to the following person:
Die Berücksichtigung eines volljährigen: The consideration of a child of legal age is possible if it
Die Berücksichtigung eines über 18 Jahre: The consideration of a child above the age of 18 with respect to the payment of child benefit is barred, if the child has income of more than 8.004 Euro that is intended or suitable as means of subsistence or for its job training. For this reason a "statement of income" and p.r.n. the "statement of work related tax deductions" must be included in the application for child benefit for a child of legal age.
Die Eintragung der hier abgefragten Anga: The entry of the data requested here is mandatory in any case. If the other parent/the parents of the child are deceased, it has to be stated with the addendum "deceased.". If paternity for a child hasn't been legally determined, "unknown" or "paternity not determined' has to be stated.
Die Fragen 6b bzw. 6c sind auch dann mit: Questions 6b respectively 6c have to be answered with 'yes' even if you, your spouse respectively life partner or another person that has a parent/child relationship with one of the children, is working or has been working for diplomatic or consular services.
Ein Kind ist erwerbstätig, wenn es einer: A child is gainfully employed, if it pursues an occupation aimed at generating income, that requires its personal manpover. Consequently the term "gainful employment" can be fulfilled by a dependent activity, agricultural and forestry activities, and business and self-employed activities. In comparison, the management of one's own assets is not gainful employment.
Entsprechende Nachweise (z.B. über die S: Relevant evidence (e.g. about school-or job training) have to be attached.
Folgende Zählkinder sollen berücksichtig: The following children are to be taken into account:
Füllen Sie bitte den Antragsvordruck und: Please fill in the application form as well as the appendix "Child" (Anlage Kind) legibly and check where applicable. Don't forget to attach your signature! If you are underage, a legal representative has to sign for you.
Geben Sie bitte das Konto an, auf welche: Please specify the account, to which the child benefit should be transferred. The IBAN (international bank account number) and the BIC (internationl bank identifier code) replace the previous national account data) and can be seen on your bank statement.
Hier sind beispielsweise Ansprüche auf F: Here you have to fill in for example claims of family benefits for children that exist abroad, or child-related benefits from an employment Authorityt (e.g. the European Union).
Hierzu zählt auch die bei einem privaten: This also includes the activities performed at a private employer, as far as employees in public service have been put on leave for this. Religious communities under the public law (churches including religious orders, church hospitals, schools, and kindergarten and the like) as well as umbrella-/member associations of statutory welfare and bodies associated with them, are not considered part of public service.
Hinweis nach dem Bundesdatenschutzgesetz: Information according to the German Data Protection Act: The Data is collected, processed and used due to and for the purpose of §§ 31, 62 to 78 Einkommenssteuergesetz (Income Tax Act) and legal regulation and the Bundeskindergeldgesetz (Federal Child Benefit Act) and the Sozialgesetzbuch (Code of Social Law).
Hinweise zum Antrag auf Kindergeld und z: Information for the application for child benefit and for "Anlage KInd"
Ich versichere, dass ich alle Angaben (a: I hereby declare that all the information was provided truthfully (in the appendixes as well). I am aware that any change concerning the given information has to be reported to the responsible Family Benefits Office immediately. I received the information sheet and took notice of its content.
Ist Ihr Kind behindert, füllen Sie bitte: If your child is handicapped, please fill in the form "Appendix for the handicapped child of legal age." For adopted/accepted children please attach the adoption order provided by the family court as well.
Kinder, für die eine andere Person Kinde: Children, for whom another person receives child benefit, could have an increasing effect to your child benefit (counted children). If you want to claim consideration of counted children, please provide information in any case, who is receiving the child benefit for the counted childrend from which child benefit office.
Lassen Sie den Antrag auch von dem mit I: Have your spouse/life partner/the other parent sign the application as well, if he/she agrees to you receiving the child benefit. If there is no consensus, please inform the Family Benefits Office about it. If the beneficiary was determined by court, please provide the decree.
Nach Abschluss einer erstmaligen Berufsa: After completion of an initial apprenticeship or a first-degree a child in the cases of number 2 (a to d) is only considered if the child doesn't pursue a (detrimental) employment. A training (apprenticeship or degree program) is finalised, if it qualifies for the exercise of a profession, even though further advanced training is associated with it. This also applies if the degree doesn't yet qualify for the exercise of the career aspirations (e.g. sales clerk, paramedic, teacher or lawyers after passing their first state examination).
Name: Surname
Nur von der Familienkasse auszufüllen: To be filled in by the Family Benefits Center
Wenn Kinder außerhalb Ihres Haushalts le: If children are living outside your household, name the reason for it (e.g. accommodations at grandparents/foster care/home because of schooling/professional education.)
Wenn beide Elternteile eines Kindes die: If both parents of a child fulfil the qualifications for an entitlement to child benefit, the one both parents agree upon should be named as applicant. You should only tick "permanently separated" next to "Family status" if at least one spouse intends to stay separated constantly. If you are not married or your spouse/life partner is not the biological parent of at least one of the children that are listed in appendix(es) "Child", please enter the information concerning the other biological parent (or concerning both biological parents in case of foster- or grandchildren) in the according appendix "Child".
Zu 1 und 2: Angaben zur antragstellenden: Ad 1 and 2: Information concerning the applicant and the spouse/life partner
Zu 2: Kindschaftsverhältnis zur antragst: Ad 2: Relationship of child to applicant, to spouse respectively to life partner and other persons
Zu 3: Angaben für ein volljähriges Kind: Ad 3:Information for a child of legal age
Zu 3: Angaben zum Zahlungsweg: Ad 3: Information regarding the method of payment
Zu 5: Anspruch auf eine Geldleistung von: Ad 5: Claim to a cash benefit from a body outside Germany/ from a cross-or supranational body
Zu 6: Folgende Zählkinder sollen berücks: Ad 6: The following children are to be taken into account
Zu 6: Sind oder waren Sie oder eine ande: Ad 6: Are you or have you or another person that has a parent/child relationship with the child in the last five years prior to application (...)
a) für einen Beruf ausgebildet wird oder: a) is in a job training or
b) sich in einer Übergangszeit von höchs: b) is in a transition period of no more than 4 months, or
c) eine Berufsausbildung mangels Ausbild: c) can't start or continue professional training due to lack of an apprenticeship, or
d) einen geregelten Freiwilligendienst l: d) performs regulated voluntary service, or
ggf. Geburtsname und Name aus früherer E: birth name and name from previous marriage if deviating
telefonische Rückfrage tagsüber unter Nr: Daytime phone number in case of query:
wegen körperlicher, geistiger oder seeli: is not able to sustain itself due to a physical, mental, or phsychological handicap: To qualify the handicap must have occured before the child turned 25 years of age (without age limit).
„Andere Personen“, zu denen ein Kindscha: "Other persons" to whom the child has a parent/child relationship are: Parents, Stepparents, Adoptive Parents, Foster Parents, Greatparents.
„Tätigkeit im öffentlichen Dienst“ bedeu: "Public Service Activities" means an occupation as a civil servant/pension recipient / federal, state or municipal employee subject to collective agreements, or employee of another body, institution or foundation under the public law, or as a judge, professional soldier, or regular soldier.
